name: Fuzor
description:
story

Because of an accident,

You came to a strange place

You look safe now

There are a lot of guns around

Suddenly you see many monsters (zombies) wandering around. What should you do?

Exploring a strange world is your only chance to survive.

In this new environment, you need to pick up guns and kill monsters

And constantly remind yourself how close you are to death.

Content and gameplay

-Search for weapons hidden in the corner

-Fighting mutant zombies

-Explore the vast map

Game features:

-First person real and exciting game mode.

-Tense and terrible game atmosphere.
